paper_metadata.title: MAIN TEXT
paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the KCNH2 gene, including penetrance data.

functional_data.summary: The T983I variant in KCNH2 is associated with arrhythmogenic disorders.

variants.source_location: Genome editing and stem cell differentiation section
variants.additional_notes: The variant is linked to long-QT syndrome.
key_quotes: genetic variants of missense mutations (T983I) in the KCNH2 (LQT2) gene frequently relate to and arrhythmogenic disorders like QT syndrome

extraction_metadata.notes: Only one variant in KCNH2 was found in the text.
